name: The fragile frog conflict
description:
The game is about a laboratory frog who has lost his way in life and must find something to make herhappy in the time she has left.

Controls

-With right click  you calculate the trajectory of the jump

- With x the frog absorbs enemies that are within its reach

  -Once absorbed with the down arrow you can swallow the enemy and get their color 

  -To return to the original color press space

Gameplay 

-Enemies lower the life of the frog.
-The frog loses 10 energy when jumping
-You can recover life in exchange for energy if the frog remains standing
-If life or energy reaches 0 you lose
-3 different final messages

Credits

-"Frogs Legs Rag" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
